member.name: D3D10_STATE_BLOCK_MASK
member.summary: Indicates the device state.

member.name: D3D10_STATE_BLOCK_MASK.VS
member.summary: Boolean value indicating whether to save the vertex shader state.

member.name: D3D10_STATE_BLOCK_MASK.GS
member.summary: Boolean value indicating whether to save the geometry shader state.

member.name: D3D10_STATE_BLOCK_MASK.PS
member.summary: Boolean value indicating whether to save the pixel shader state.

member.name: D3D10_STATE_BLOCK_MASK.IAIndexBuffer
member.summary: Boolean value indicating whether to save the index buffer state.

member.name: D3D10_STATE_BLOCK_MASK.IAInputLayout
member.summary: Boolean value indicating whether to save the input layout state.

member.name: D3D10_STATE_BLOCK_MASK.IAPrimitiveTopology
member.summary: Boolean value indicating whether to save the primitive topology state.

member.name: D3D10_STATE_BLOCK_MASK.OMRenderTargets
member.summary: Boolean value indicating whether to save the render targets states.

member.name: D3D10_STATE_BLOCK_MASK.OMDepthStencilState
member.summary: Boolean value indicating whether to save the depth-stencil state.

member.name: D3D10_STATE_BLOCK_MASK.OMBlendState
member.summary: Boolean value indicating whether to save the blend state.

member.name: D3D10_STATE_BLOCK_MASK.RSViewports
member.summary: Boolean value indicating whether to save the viewports states.

member.name: D3D10_STATE_BLOCK_MASK.RSScissorRects
member.summary: Boolean value indicating whether to save the scissor rectangles states.

member.name: D3D10_STATE_BLOCK_MASK.RSRasterizerState
member.summary: Boolean value indicating whether to save the rasterizer state.

member.name: D3D10_STATE_BLOCK_MASK.SOBuffers
member.summary: Boolean value indicating whether to save the stream-out buffers states.

member.name: D3D10_STATE_BLOCK_MASK.Predication
member.summary: Boolean value indicating whether to save the predication state.

member.name: D3D10_STATE_BLOCK_MASK.GSConstantBuffers
member.summary: Array of geometry-shader constant buffers. The array is a multi-byte bitmask where each bit represents one buffer slot.

member.name: D3D10_STATE_BLOCK_MASK.GSSamplers
member.summary: Array of geometry-shader samplers. The array is a multi-byte bitmask where each bit represents one sampler slot.

member.name: D3D10_STATE_BLOCK_MASK.GSShaderResources
member.summary: Array of geometry-shader resources. The array is a multi-byte bitmask where each bit represents one resource slot.

member.name: D3D10_STATE_BLOCK_MASK.IAVertexBuffers
member.summary: Array of vertex buffers. The array is a multi-byte bitmask where each bit represents one resource slot.

member.name: D3D10_STATE_BLOCK_MASK.PSConstantBuffers
member.summary: Array of pixel-shader constant buffers. The array is a multi-byte bitmask where each bit represents one constant buffer slot.

member.name: D3D10_STATE_BLOCK_MASK.PSSamplers
member.summary: Array of pixel-shader samplers. The array is a multi-byte bitmask where each bit represents one sampler slot.

member.name: D3D10_STATE_BLOCK_MASK.PSShaderResources
member.summary: Array of pixel-shader resources. The array is a multi-byte bitmask where each bit represents one resource slot.

member.name: D3D10_STATE_BLOCK_MASK.VSConstantBuffers
member.summary: Array of vertex-shader constant buffers. The array is a multi-byte bitmask where each bit represents one constant buffer slot.

member.name: D3D10_STATE_BLOCK_MASK.VSSamplers
member.summary: Array of vertex-shader samplers. The array is a multi-byte bitmask where each bit represents one sampler slot.

member.name: D3D10_STATE_BLOCK_MASK.VSShaderResources
member.summary: Array of vertex-shader resources. The array is a multi-byte bitmask where each bit represents one resource slot.
